name: Sue Chef
description:
Sue Chef is a simple version of a card/strategy game inspired by one of my favorite TV Shows - MasterChef

You play a sous-chef that is in a professional kitchen trying to keep up with the orders as they flood in. Pay attention to the Order Card - if the ingredients are not clicked in the right order it could be disastrous!!!

You only have 30 seconds (in the rush to submit I forgot to change the time back) to make as many orders as possible.

Controls

Use the mouse to click ingredients and navigate menus

ESC - Back to main menu

S - Toggle Music

Background music - from Audionautix.com

Created for Jim Jam GDU
